inclusion.criterion: positive Clostridium difficile stool toxin assay
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous episode of clinically diagnosed Clostridium difficile within the past 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: chronic diseases associated with diarrhea (e.g., inflammatory bowel disease or diarrhea predominant irritable bowel syndrome [DIBS])
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman admitted to the stroke department with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and symptoms consistent with Clostridium difficile infection.
